# Factorio Agent Report (Updated)

### Copper Ore Mining Operation at (-46.5, 70.5)

- Output chest at (-46.5, 72.5)
- Connected to small electric pole at (-44.5, 69.5)
- Currently not powered (status: NO_POWER)

### Water Supply System
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, -0.5) facing RIGHT
- Extensive pipe network extending from (-8.5, -0.5) to (30.5, 63.5)
- Currently working (status: WORKING) with water flowing

### Power Generation Area (Under Construction)
- Area cleared for new boiler and steam engine placement
- Existing pipe groups present but not properly connected

## ERROR TIPS

### Placement Errors (Repeated)
- Cannot place pipes/boilers on occupied tiles - verify position is clear before placing
- Attempted to place pipe at (20.5, 69.5) and (21.5, 69.5) on occupied tiles
- Attempted to place boiler at (19.0, 69.5) on occupied tile

### Fluid System Connection Errors
- Failed to connect offshore pump to boiler location (x=19.0, y=69.5)
  - Ensure continuous pipe path exists between source and destination
  - Verify all connection points are accessible
  - Consider using pipe-to-ground for long distances

### Entity Management Errors
- Attempted to access non-existent boiler at (19.0, 69.5)
  - Always verify entity exists before accessing
  - Use proper entity detection methods before operations

### General Tips (Updated)
- When rebuilding systems, completely clear the area first
- Plan pipe routes carefully considering all connection points
- Verify fluid systems are properly connected before placing dependent machines
- Check entity positions and orientations match connection requirements
- For long-distance fluid transport, consider using underground pipes
